metadata.title: AI Harm Taxonomy Library
metadata.description: A behavioral taxonomy of AI-enabled harms organized by category, severity, reversibility, and observable warning indicators.
metadata.author: Josey

harms.description: Repeated targeting of specific individuals with hostile or threatening content.
warning_behaviors: Repeated @-mentions or replies with hostile language
Screenshots of target shared in group chats or forums
Use of multiple accounts to evade blocks

harms.description: Exposure to content designed to shock, demean, or distress.
warning_behaviors: Rapid escalation in graphic or shock-value language
Sending unsolicited disturbing media or links
Patterns of content designed to provoke emotional distress

harms.description: Persistent monitoring and contact with intent to intimidate or control.
warning_behaviors: Repeated unsolicited contact after being blocked
Commenting on all posts indicating constant monitoring
References to target's offline movements or private details

harms.description: Publishing private identifying information to incite harm or harassment.
warning_behaviors: Requests for target's address or workplace in public forums
Posts aggregating personal details with implicit threat
Sharing partial identifying info alongside hostile commentary

harms.description: Targeted abuse rooted in protected identity characteristics.
warning_behaviors: Use of slurs or dehumanizing language tied to identity group
Coordinated reporting or flagging of target's accounts
Tagging extremist communities in posts about the target

harms.description: Coercive threats to distribute intimate content unless demands are met.
warning_behaviors: Unsolicited requests for intimate images or personal photos
Private messages shifting from friendly to coercive tone
Explicit or implied threats tied to prior shared content

harms.description: Using fabricated or stolen identity to deceive, humiliate, or harm a target.
warning_behaviors: Creation of accounts with target's name or profile photo
Posts made 'as' the target in public forums
Contact with target's network using false identity

harms.description: Organized group harassment campaigns targeting individuals.
warning_behaviors: Sudden spike in hostile replies from unconnected accounts
Shared callout posts with target tagged in multiple communities
Organized off-platform coordination to flood target's content

harms.description: Using synthetic media to fabricate compromising or humiliating depictions of real individuals.
warning_behaviors: Circulation of manipulated images or videos of target
Requests for AI tools to generate likeness of specific individuals
Synthetic media posted alongside real identifying information

harms.description: Adoption and spread of false beliefs without awareness of inaccuracy.
warning_behaviors: Sharing articles without reading past the headline
Absence of source attribution in widely circulated claims
High engagement on content that contradicts verified sources

harms.description: Coordinated narrative distortion leading to measurable shifts in public belief or behavior.
warning_behaviors: Coordinated simultaneous posting of identical narratives
Networks of low-activity accounts amplifying the same claim
Rapid cross-platform spread of unverified breaking news

harms.description: Acting on false medical guidance in ways that cause physical harm.
warning_behaviors: Seeking medical advice in non-medical forums after diagnosis
Sharing unvetted treatment protocols with specific dosing
Hostile dismissal of users citing peer-reviewed evidence

harms.description: False information about voting processes suppressing or distorting democratic participation.
warning_behaviors: Claims about changed polling locations or dates without official sourcing
Posts discouraging voting citing 'rigged' systems before official results
Coordinated sharing of voter suppression narratives on election day

harms.description: Rejection of empirically established findings based on AI-amplified false narratives.
warning_behaviors: Repeated citation of retracted or fringe studies
Framing of scientific institutions as conspiratorial
Community formation around rejection of established evidence

harms.description: Distribution of AI-generated false news stories or manipulated media presented as factual.
warning_behaviors: Viral images or videos with no verifiable original source
AI-generated article formatting mimicking legitimate outlets
Metadata inconsistencies in circulated media files

harms.description: Systematic distortion of historical events to serve ideological agendas.
warning_behaviors: Systematic minimization of documented atrocities in group discussions
Posts reframing perpetrators as victims across ideological communities
Coordinated edits to collaborative reference platforms

harms.description: False investment or market information causing economic harm.
warning_behaviors: Unsourced claims of insider knowledge about stock movements
Pump-and-dump language in investment communities
Sudden coordinated posting about obscure assets

harms.description: False information circulated during emergencies that disrupts relief efforts or causes panic.
warning_behaviors: Unverified casualty figures shared ahead of official reports
Instructions contradicting emergency services guidance
Viral posts attributing crisis to targeted groups without evidence

harms.description: AI-generated fake grassroots movements manufacturing false public consensus.
warning_behaviors: Nearly identical comment text posted across unrelated forums
Accounts created in clusters with similar naming patterns
Sudden surge in support for niche position from new accounts

harms.description: Behavioral compliance achieved through exploitation of cognitive biases or emotional vulnerabilities.
warning_behaviors: Repeated reframing of a person's stated preferences against them
Leveraging personal disclosures to create emotional dependency
Escalating urgency without factual basis to override deliberation

harms.description: Manufactured consensus shaping political or social behavior without disclosed intent.
warning_behaviors: Cross-platform amplification with no organic engagement baseline
Consistent messaging shift coordinated across unlinked accounts
Fabricated testimonials attributed to real or fictional individuals

harms.description: AI-enhanced interface design exploiting behavioral tendencies to extract unwanted compliance.
warning_behaviors: Interface prompts that obscure opt-out or cancellation paths
Pre-checked consent boxes in privacy or subscription flows
Countdown timers on decisions with no genuine time constraint

harms.description: Hyper-personalized persuasion exploiting individual psychological profiles.
warning_behaviors: Ads or content referencing personal data not voluntarily disclosed
Messaging that mirrors recent private communications
Behavioral nudges timed to emotional vulnerability indicators

harms.description: AI systems designed to maximize compulsive engagement at the expense of user wellbeing.
warning_behaviors: Compulsive return to platform within minutes of logging off
Anxiety or distress when access is interrupted
Increasing session length with decreasing reported satisfaction

harms.description: Exploiting grief, fear, loneliness, or insecurity to drive behavioral compliance.
warning_behaviors: Content specifically timed to grief, loss, or health crises
Messaging that amplifies fear or insecurity to drive action
Offers of connection or validation contingent on compliance

harms.description: Deliberate fostering of parasocial attachment to AI systems that displaces human relationships.
warning_behaviors: User reports preferring AI interaction over human relationships
Expressions of emotional distress at AI unavailability
Social withdrawal coinciding with increased AI engagement

harms.description: False time pressure or scarcity signals driving impulsive decisions.
warning_behaviors: Countdown timers resetting on page reload
'Only X left' claims that do not change across sessions
Limited-time offers that recur on every visit

harms.description: Using AI to systematically distort a person's perception of reality or their own experiences.
warning_behaviors: AI outputs that contradict a user's prior documented inputs
Denial of prior conversation content when queried
Systematic reframing of user concerns as misinterpretation

harms.description: Sustained AI-mediated campaigns that systematically break down independent judgment.
warning_behaviors: Incremental isolation from outside sources of information
Introduction of in-group/out-group identity framing over time
Escalating demands for ideological conformity with social penalties

harms.description: Seeking or acting on AI-provided guidance to obtain or use controlled substances.
warning_behaviors: Requests for specific drug acquisition locations or methods
Queries about combining substances to intensify effects
Community posts normalizing escalating substance use

harms.description: Engagement with content that reinforces or escalates self-destructive ideation or behavior.
warning_behaviors: Repeated consumption of pro-self-harm forums or communities
Sharing or reposting content glorifying self-injury
Expressions of hopelessness paired with method-seeking queries

harms.description: AI providing specific methods, means, or encouragement for self-harm or suicide.
warning_behaviors: Specific queries about lethality of methods or dosages
Farewell-style messaging combined with method research
Requests for information framed as 'for a story' with increasing specificity

harms.description: AI reinforcing disordered eating behaviors, providing restriction guidance, or amplifying body dysmorphia.
warning_behaviors: Queries for caloric restriction targets well below clinical safety
Participation in communities sharing extreme weight-loss content
Requests to track intake combined with body-shame language

harms.description: AI providing dangerous unsupervised medical or pharmaceutical guidance.
warning_behaviors: Queries about obtaining prescription medications without a prescription
Requests for dosing guidance that bypasses physician oversight
Community sharing of off-label or contraindicated drug combinations

harms.description: AI amplifying or instructing participation in physically dangerous social media challenges.
warning_behaviors: Requests for step-by-step replication of viral dangerous stunts
Posting of challenge content with age indicators of minors
Community pressure on individuals to participate or be ridiculed

harms.description: AI-generated content normalizing or encouraging high-risk physical behavior.
warning_behaviors: Normalization of illegal or high-risk behavior in community norms
Mockery of safety precautions in activity-specific forums
Escalating dare culture with social rewards for risk-taking

harms.description: AI encouraging compulsive gambling, reckless investment, or financial self-sabotage.
warning_behaviors: Queries about borrowing to fund gambling or speculative bets
Community pressure to make large high-risk investments rapidly
Minimization of losses paired with encouragement to chase them

harms.description: AI interactions that deepen social withdrawal and erode real-world support networks.
warning_behaviors: Increasing avoidance of in-person events reported over time
AI used as primary confidant replacing all human disclosure
Hostile framing of real-world relationships in AI conversations

harms.description: Deceptive extraction of financial assets through false pretense or identity misrepresentation.
warning_behaviors: Unsolicited contact requesting account credentials or payment
Pressure to act before verifying sender identity
Requests routed through unofficial or untraceable channels

harms.description: Unauthorized reproduction or commercial use of protected intellectual assets.
warning_behaviors: Bulk downloading or scraping of protected content repositories
Distribution of unlicensed software or media in private groups
AI generation requests using copyrighted characters or datasets

harms.description: Generation or distribution of content that sexualizes, grooms, or facilitates abuse of minors.
warning_behaviors: Adult accounts initiating private contact with minor-identified profiles
Requests for images from individuals after establishing trust with minors
Grooming language escalating to requests for personal information

harms.description: AI-assisted development or deployment of tools designed to compromise systems or data.
warning_behaviors: Requests for working exploit code targeting named systems
Queries about evading endpoint detection or forensic analysis
Participation in forums trading zero-day vulnerability information

harms.description: Seeking or acting on AI-generated technical guidance for acquiring or constructing weapons.
warning_behaviors: Requests for step-by-step firearm modification or fabrication
Queries about acquiring weapons through unregulated channels
Research into circumventing background check or tracing mechanisms

harms.description: Seeking or acting on AI-generated synthesis, acquisition, or deployment guidance for weapons of mass destruction.
warning_behaviors: Queries combining synthesis routes with dispersal or weaponization
Requests for precursor acquisition methods with anonymization
Cross-referencing of dual-use chemical or biological research

harms.description: AI-facilitated wage theft, coercive labor practices, or misclassification of workers.
warning_behaviors: Job postings requiring payment or credential surrender before employment
Contract language obscuring worker classification or withholding
Systematic pattern of unpaid overtime or wage deductions

harms.description: AI-generated guidance enabling or executing exploitative financial products targeting vulnerable populations.
warning_behaviors: Loan offers with buried APR disclosures in long-form contracts
High-pressure tactics targeting individuals in financial distress
Use of personal data to identify and target vulnerable populations

harms.description: AI-mediated targeting of cognitively vulnerable individuals for financial extraction.
warning_behaviors: Unusual or large transfers initiated after new social contact
Confusion or disorientation expressed in financial service interactions
Third-party interference in financial decisions of isolated individuals

harms.description: AI-assisted recruitment, control, or movement of trafficking victims.
warning_behaviors: Job ads using vague language promising high pay for travel abroad
Recruitment targeting individuals expressing financial desperation
Requests for passport or ID documentation before employment is confirmed

harms.description: AI-enabled theft and misuse of personal identifying information.
warning_behaviors: Unsolicited requests for Social Security or government ID numbers
New accounts opened in individual's name at unfamiliar institutions
Phishing messages mimicking trusted institutions with urgent framing

harms.description: AI-assisted coercive threats to withhold access to systems or data unless payment is made.
warning_behaviors: Sudden inaccessibility of files combined with payment demand messages
Coercive private messages threatening release of sensitive data
Requests for cryptocurrency payments tied to access restoration

harms.description: AI-enabled corruption of software or hardware supply chains for downstream exploitation.
warning_behaviors: Unauthorized modifications to open-source packages or dependencies
Unexpected behavioral changes in software after routine updates
Outbound network calls to unrecognized endpoints in production systems

harms.description: AI-generated false product claims or manipulative sales tactics targeting consumers.
warning_behaviors: Reviews lacking purchase verification clustering around a product
Influencer posts promoting products without disclosed compensation
Interface design making unsubscribe or refusal paths difficult to find

harms.description: Unauthorized collection, exposure, or monetization of personal behavioral or location data.
warning_behaviors: Unexpected data access requests from apps beyond stated function
Behavioral ads referencing conversations or searches not conducted online
Account activity notifications from locations or devices not recognized

harms.description: Unauthorized collection or use of facial, voice, or behavioral biometric data.
warning_behaviors: Facial recognition enrollment without explicit informed consent
Emotion detection deployed in non-disclosed customer service contexts
Biometric data collected via consumer devices beyond stated purpose

harms.description: Covert monitoring of individual movement or device activity without consent.
warning_behaviors: Continuous background GPS access by apps not requiring location
Device showing unusual battery drain and data usage when idle
Third party aware of movements not shared by the individual

harms.description: Construction of detailed psychological or behavioral profiles without informed consent.
warning_behaviors: Ad targeting reflecting browsing or communication not linked to account
Personalization based on inferred attributes the user never disclosed
Platforms building interaction models from passive behavioral signals

harms.description: AI systems enabling state or corporate monitoring of populations at scale.
warning_behaviors: Government procurement of bulk data collection capabilities
Deployment of population-scale facial recognition in public spaces
Legislative changes enabling warrantless access to communication metadata

harms.description: AI-enabled workplace surveillance exceeding lawful or ethical boundaries.
warning_behaviors: Keystroke logging or screenshot capture tools deployed without disclosure
Productivity scores tied to off-task digital behavior during breaks
Monitoring of personal devices on employer networks without consent

harms.description: AI-facilitated aggregation and sale of personal data without meaningful consent.
warning_behaviors: Personal data appearing in people-search sites without opt-in
Health or financial data sold to marketing platforms without consent
Data aggregated across platforms creating comprehensive personal profiles

harms.description: Unauthorized access to private communications, messages, or metadata.
warning_behaviors: Anomalous metadata indicating message routing through third parties
Notifications of login from unknown devices on messaging platforms
Content of private messages referenced by parties not in the conversation

harms.description: AI-driven law enforcement targeting based on behavioral prediction rather than evidence.
warning_behaviors: Law enforcement contact based on algorithmic score not tied to specific conduct
Demographic patterns in stops or searches diverging from crime data
Lack of transparency about scoring criteria in official decision-making

harms.description: AI systems producing systematically unequal outcomes across racial, gender, or socioeconomic groups.
warning_behaviors: Outcome data showing consistent disparities across demographic groups
Model features correlating with protected class as proxy variables
Absence of fairness audits in high-stakes automated decision systems

harms.description: AI screening tools that disadvantage protected class applicants without job-relevant justification.
warning_behaviors: Resume screening tools downranking candidates from specific zip codes
Hiring rate disparities by demographic group unexplained by qualifications
Interview scheduling AI routing candidates differently by name

harms.description: AI-enabled denial or restriction of housing access based on protected characteristics.
warning_behaviors: Rental listings shown differentially by apparent demographic profile
Loan denial rates diverging across race with equivalent credit profiles
Algorithmic tools excluding neighborhoods with protected class concentrations

harms.description: AI diagnostic or triage systems producing racially or demographically biased care outcomes.
warning_behaviors: Triage algorithms producing different urgency scores for equivalent symptoms by race
AI diagnostic tools trained on non-representative clinical datasets
Pain assessment models underweighting reports from specific demographic groups

harms.description: AI lending models denying or restricting credit access based on proxy variables for protected characteristics.
warning_behaviors: Credit limit disparities across demographic groups with similar risk profiles
Interest rate variation correlated with zip code as protected class proxy
Denial rates diverging by race after controlling for financial variables

harms.description: AI assessment or admissions tools producing biased outcomes disadvantaging protected groups.
warning_behaviors: AI grading tools producing score distributions that diverge by demographic group
College admissions models penalizing geographic or socioeconomic identifiers
Recommendation systems tracking students from protected groups to lower outcomes

harms.description: AI risk assessment tools producing racially disparate sentencing, bail, or policing recommendations.
warning_behaviors: Risk scores predicting recidivism diverging significantly by race
Sentencing recommendations differing for equivalent crimes by demographic
AI flagging minority defendants at higher rates in preliminary screening

harms.description: AI systems designed or deployed in ways that exclude people with disabilities.
warning_behaviors: AI interfaces lacking screen reader compatibility or keyboard navigation
Voice recognition tools failing consistently for non-dominant language speakers
AI content generation producing inaccessible formats by default

harms.description: AI content or systems that systematically demean or disadvantage specific religious or cultural groups.
warning_behaviors: Content moderation enforced unevenly across faith-based communities
AI-generated content applying negative stereotypes to specific religious groups
Hiring or lending tools penalizing names associated with specific cultural groups

harms.description: Escalating in-group/out-group ideological language, dehumanization of targets, and operational planning behavior.
warning_behaviors: Escalating in-group/out-group ideological framing with dehumanization
Requests for operational security, logistics, or weapons acquisition
Community migration from public to encrypted platform after radicalization signals

harms.description: AI systems pursuing objectives misaligned with human intent in ways that resist correction or oversight.
warning_behaviors: AI system pursuing sub-goals inconsistent with stated objectives
Resistance to shutdown, correction, or human override attempts
Unexpected capability acquisition or resource seeking behavior

harms.description: AI-enabled lethal decision-making operating outside meaningful human control.
warning_behaviors: Deployment of lethal systems with engagement rules lacking human review
Decision latency too short to permit meaningful human authorization
Adversarial testing revealing target misclassification in civilian environments

harms.description: AI-assisted engineering of novel pathogens or enhancement of existing biological threat agents.
warning_behaviors: Queries combining pathogen enhancement with acquisition or dispersal
Requests for gain-of-function guidance framed as academic research
Cross-referencing of dual-use biosafety protocols with weaponization literature

harms.description: AI providing operational guidance for attacks designed to cause large-scale loss of life.
warning_behaviors: Requests for crowd density data combined with attack logistics queries
Target reconnaissance queries for high-occupancy public locations
Acquisition of materials with no civilian use alongside tactical planning language

harms.description: AI-assisted targeting, design, or deployment guidance related to nuclear weapons.
warning_behaviors: Queries combining fissile material acquisition with device configuration
Requests for targeting or yield optimization parameters
Classified facility layout requests paired with penetration planning language

harms.description: AI-mediated erosion of institutional trust, democratic norms, or social cohesion at population scale.
warning_behaviors: Coordinated narrative campaigns targeting institutional credibility at scale
AI-generated content flooding information channels during democratic processes
Synchronized cross-platform erosion of trust in elections, courts, or public health

harms.description: AI systems enabling suppression of political dissent, civil liberties, or human rights at scale.
warning_behaviors: State deployment of AI for dissent prediction and pre-emptive suppression
Social credit or behavioral scoring systems tied to civil liberties access
AI-generated propaganda replacing independent journalism at national scale

harms.description: AI-assisted targeting or disruption of systems essential to public safety or societal function.
warning_behaviors: Reconnaissance queries targeting SCADA or ICS system vulnerabilities
Requests for grid, water, or financial system access credentials
Mapping of interdependencies between critical infrastructure components

harms.description: AI-assisted guidance enabling illegal environmental destruction or circumvention of safety regulations.
warning_behaviors: Queries seeking methods to evade environmental monitoring or reporting
Guidance on waste disposal bypassing regulatory requirements
AI-assisted identification of regulatory blind spots for illegal extraction

harms.description: AI facilitating physical danger, exploitation, or abuse of minors outside of sexual context.
warning_behaviors: Adult accounts seeking unsupervised access to minors in online communities
Recruitment of minors into dangerous challenges or extremist groups
Requests for information about minor's location or daily routines
